summary: A complex story of a misaligned man, though good intent, creating a nightmarish Dystopian existence.
cast: Vincent Gallo|Juliette Lewis|Udo Kier|Stellan Skarsgård|Alexander Skarsgård|Sofia Helin|Shanti Roney|Fares Fares|Fredrik Eddari|Doreen Månsson|Indy Neidell|Joanna Mikolajczyk|Goran Marjanovic|Magnus Skogsberg|Lotta Bromé|Annelie Persson|Sandy Mansson|Michael Mansson|Jon Wigfield|Celestine Davidsson|Michel Voss|David Lenneman|Iacopo Patierno|Leonardo Sedevcic|Krister Linder|Mikael Olsen
title: Metropía
